text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse With all the chaos & racial division I forgot about #coronavirus. Seems like Mainstream media forgot about it too. @GovWhitmer @TuckerCarlson @POTUS @NewsHour @NBCNews @CNN @MSNBC @ABC @NBCNews @CBSNews @NYGovCuomo @GregAbbott_TX @GavinNewsom @MayorFrey @WCCO
